ActSpecial Appointment Regulations, No. 2005-1
PrecisAppointment of WILLIAM J.S. ELLIOTT of Ottawa, Ontario, to be National Security Advisor to the Prime Minister, to hold office during pleasure, effective April 8, 2005.
